game.name: Sleeping with the Phish
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A comedic office simulation where you’re the intern battling a chaotic inbox. Spot phishing scams, outsmart tricky coworkers, and survive the hilarious madness of corporate email life.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A comedic office simulation where you’re the intern battling a chaotic inbox. Spot phishing scams, outsmart tricky coworkers, and survive the hilarious madness of corporate email life.
